articles.title: भारत-पाक सीमा पर समझौता, घरेलू सियासत में शुरू हुई ‘जंग’, करार पर कांग्रेस उठा रही सवाल
articles.description: भारत-पाकिस्तान सीमा पर समझौते के बाद, भारतीय राजनीति में सरगर्मी बढ़ गई है। विपक्ष, कांग्रेस के नेतृत्व में, संसद का विशेष सत्र बुलाने की मांग कर रहा है ताकि भारत-पाक के बीच तनाव और सरकार की रणनीति पर चर्चा हो सके।

articles.title: India-Nepal security personnel intensify monitoring to curb cross-border infiltration
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: KATHMANDU, May 11: Security personnel from both Nepal and India have intensified monitoring at 20 border points to curb infiltration along the 83-kilometre open border between Bardiya in the Himalayan nation and India, an offical said.. The majority of this stretch runs adjacent to India’s Katarniaghat Wildlife Sanctuary and dense forest areas, which are considered high-risk zones. “Joint patrols are being carried out in the no-man’s-land by Nepal’s Armed Police Force (APF), Nepal Police, and India’s Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB),” [...]The post India-Nepal security personnel intensify monitoring to curb cross-border infiltration appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: Director Agriculture conducts inspection of seed stores in border areas
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, May 11: In a proactive step to ensure the timely and uninterrupted supply of seeds to border areas for the upcoming Kharif season, Director Agriculture Jammu, Arvinder Singh Reen, today conducted a comprehensive inspection of seed stores located in the border areas of Jammu district. Accompanied by Dr. Ashwani Kumar, Joint Director Agriculture (Inputs), the Director Agriculture visited several key locations including Bishnah, Chak Hasal, Arnia, Dablehar, Dharap, Kirpind and other adjoining Zonal Seed Stores of Sub [...]The post Director Agriculture conducts inspection of seed stores in border areas appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: दिन में खटरपटर... रात में शांत! बंद घर में चार लोग और लोहा 'गर्म'; तिलक वाली बात पर पहुंची पुलिस तो सामने आया 'राज'
articles.description: Gopalganj Police: गोपालगंज पुलिस ने कुचायकोट में अवैध हथियार फैक्ट्री का भंडाफोड़ किया है। इस मामले में चार लोग गिरफ्तार हुए हैं। पुलिस ने फैक्ट्री से कई हथियार और औजार बरामद किए हैं। सूचना मिलने पर पुलिस ने इसुआपुर गांव में छापा मारा। तिलक समारोह में हथियार लहराने के बाद मामले की जांच शुरू हुई थी।

articles.title: MRM Bharat Yatra to show solidarity with Indian Army reaches Jammu
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, May 11: In a determined stride towards fostering unity and peace across Bharat, the Muslim Rashtriya Manch (MRM) has embarked on the “Bharat Yatra,” a nationwide initiative supporting the Indian Army and advocating for a terror-free, riot-free and hate-free nation. This ambitious journey began in Jaipur Rajasthan and aims to culminate in the Union Territory of Jammu & Kashmir, symbolizing a collective stand against terrorism, communalism and hatred. In a press statement, the Yatra, which passed through [...]The post MRM Bharat Yatra to show solidarity with Indian Army reaches Jammu appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: KCCI urges Govt to ensure Hajj flights
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent Srinagar, May 11: The Kashmir Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KCCI) today urged the Government to take measures to ensure that pilgrims are able to travel to Saudi Arabia for the annual Hajj. In a statement, the KCCI called for intervention from the Lieutenant Governor, Manoj Sinha, and Chief Minister, Omar Abdullah, to help 3,000 pilgrims who are stuck due to the disruption of flight operations at Srinagar Airport. The KCCI expressed deep concern over the distress faced [...]The post KCCI urges Govt to ensure Hajj flights appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: Colorado Rockies fires manager Bud Black after a humiliating defeat this season, Warren Schaeffer takes over as interim manager
articles.description: The Colorado Rockies have dismissed manager Bud Black after a disappointing run, despite recent support from General Manager Bill Schmidt. Third-base coach Warren Schaeffer will take over as interim manager for the remainder of the 2025 season. Bench coach Mike Redmond was also fired, with hitting coach Clint Hurdle stepping in as interim bench coach.

articles.title: Natrang stages play ‘Topian’
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, May 11: Theatre group ‘Natrang’ here today staged play ‘Topian’ written by Mani Madhukar and directed by Neeraj Kant. It is pertinent to mention here that Natrang is performing nonstop theatre every Sunday since the last 22 years which is a record. The play shows story of two neighbours who pledge to change the political scene and are shown looking for alternatives. Each time they come across a person they meet only the one wearing different caps [...]The post Natrang stages play ‘Topian’ appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: Civil Society, others condemn ceasefire violations by Pakistan
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, May 11: Various social and other organizations led by president J&K Civil Society, Kiran Wattal today condemned Pakistan for ceasefire violations along the Line of Control (LoC) and the International Border (IB) in Jammu and Kashmir and other parts of country hours after ceasefire agreement. They attribute Pakistan’s continuous ceasefire violations to frustration over Indian security forces killing militants and preventing them from pushing fresh terrorists into Indian territory. Ceasefire violations have been reported in various sectors [...]The post Civil Society, others condemn ceasefire violations by Pakistan appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: 'Thunderbolts' and 'Sinners' top box office; Marvel film records fourth highest collection of 2025
articles.description: Marvel's "Thunderbolts" and Ryan Coogler's "Sinners" continue to dominate the box office, with "Thunderbolts" securing the top spot for the second consecutive weekend, earning $33.1 million domestically. "Sinners" crossed $200 million in North American sales. New releases like "Clown in a Cornfield" made a small splash, while "Friendship" saw a successful limited release.

articles.title: ‘Kesari Chapter 2’ Box Office collection day 24: Akshay Kumar and R. Madhavan’s film inches closer to Rs. 90 crore as it wraps up fourth Sunday
articles.description: Akshay Kumar's courtroom drama, 'Kesari Chapter 2', is nearing the end of its successful theatrical run, earning ₹86.80 crore in India after 24 days. Despite facing competition from 'Raid 2', the film held its ground, driven by strong performances and an emotional storyline based on the Jallianwala Bagh massacre. While unlikely to reach ₹100 crore, it resonated with audiences.

articles.title: Ambika Colony Gurdwara Committee constituted
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, May 11: A new Management Committee of Gurdwara Singh Sabha, Ambika Colony, Kunjwani , Jammu has been constituted. In a meeting of the members/ Sangat of the locality held at the Gurdwara Singh Sabha recently under the chairmanship of Dr Kulwinder Singh, a five- member Management Committee of the said Gurdwara was constituted for a period of two years. Dr Kulwinder Singh has been unanimously elected as chairman, Manjit Singh as president, Trilok Singh –general secretary, Bikram [...]The post Ambika Colony Gurdwara Committee constituted appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: WWE icon Sabu dies at 60: Here's how the ECW legend got his Indian name
articles.description: Wrestling world mourns the loss of Terry Brunk, known as Sabu, a hardcore wrestling pioneer, who passed away at 60. Renowned for his fearless style, Sabu, inspired by actor Sabu Dastagir, revolutionized ECW with his extreme stunts and unpredictable matches. His legacy extends across wrestling promotions, leaving behind a trail of awe and respect.

articles.title: 3 फीसद पर आ सकती है खुदरा महंगाई, सस्ते लोन और ईएमआई कम होने की बढ़ी उम्मीद
articles.description: सब्जियों, दालों, और अंडों की कीमतें कम होने से खाद्य महंगाई दर मार्च में घटकर 2.69% पर आ गई थी। आरबीआई इस वर्ष रेपो रेट में कम से कम 50 बेसिस प्वाइंट (0.50 प्रतिशत) की कटौती कर सकता है।
